channel.title: Invisible player?
channel.description:
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2h2h75k.jpg[/img]
As you can see.. Player one can see Player two, Player two can't see player one, but can see 'null'. and null in the chatting..
This is a stripped down server from my X-PK server, being run with my X-PK client. I also think it doesn't handle login responses so it may be client.java related, It doesn't output a login response when I try to connect a mudclient40 client to it, but my original XPK server does put out a response when you try to connect.. so im not sure what's up there.. any ideas guys ?
Download Link: http://uppit.com/w84oydrt1uc4/199_Server_&_Client.rar // XPK - SERVER + CLIENT http://uppit.com/2rgnfa8a6cea/server40.rar // NEW SERVER (With error in image above)
EDIT: Fixed the login responses, still can't see the player tho, players that are already logged in can see players that login, but the ones that login can't see the ones that are already logged in.

item.title: Invisible player?
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

As you can see… Player one can see Player two, Player two can’t see player one, but can see ‘null’. and null in the chatting…

This is a stripped down server from my X-PK server, being run with my X-PK client.
I also think it doesn’t handle login responses so it may be client.java related,
It doesn’t output a login response when I try to connect a mudclient40 client to it, but my original XPK server does put out a response when you try to connect… so im not sure what’s up there… any ideas guys ?

Download Link:
http://uppit.com/w84oydrt1uc4/199_Server_&_Client.rar // XPK - SERVER + CLIENT
http://uppit.com/2rgnfa8a6cea/server40.rar // NEW SERVER (With error in image above)

EDIT:
Fixed the login responses, still can’t see the player tho, players that are already logged in can see players that login, but the ones that login can’t see the ones that are already logged in.
